disk.name: Combo (Recommended)
disk.description: 49MB multi-slice disk with CP/M 2.2, games, utilities, and R8/W8 host file transfer. Best starter disk.

disk.name: CP/M 2.2
disk.description: Digital Research CP/M 2.2 operating system with standard utilities.

disk.name: ZSDOS
disk.description: Z-System DOS - enhanced CP/M compatible OS with date/time stamping.

disk.name: ZPM3
disk.description: Z-System Plus/M3 - enhanced CP/M 3 compatible with ZCPR extensions.

disk.name: CP/M 3
disk.description: CP/M Plus (CP/M 3.0) - NOT WORKING, under investigation.

disk.name: NZCOM
disk.description: NZCOM - Z-System implementation for CP/M 2.2 environments.

disk.name: QPM
disk.description: QPM - QP/M operating system, CP/M 2.2 compatible alternative.

disk.name: Games
disk.description: Collection of classic CP/M games including adventures and arcade.

disk.name: Infocom Adventures
disk.description: Classic Infocom text adventures with VEZZA interpreter. Run: VEZZA ZORK1.Z3

disk.name: Aztec C
disk.description: Aztec C compiler for CP/M - professional C development environment.

disk.name: BASIC Compilers
disk.description: Collection of BASIC compilers and interpreters for CP/M.

disk.name: Cowgol
disk.description: Cowgol compiler - modern language targeting 8-bit systems.

disk.name: Fortran
disk.description: Fortran compiler for CP/M - scientific computing language.

disk.name: Hi-Tech C
disk.description: Hi-Tech C compiler - optimizing C compiler for Z80 CP/M.

disk.name: Turbo Pascal
disk.description: Borland Turbo Pascal 3.0 - fast Pascal IDE and compiler.

disk.name: Z80 Assemblers
disk.description: Collection of Z80 assemblers and development tools.

disk.name: WordStar 4
disk.description: WordStar 4.0 - classic word processor for CP/M.

disk.name: Z3Plus
disk.description: Z3Plus - ZCPR3 command processor with enhanced features.

disk.name: B/P Bios
disk.description: B/P Bios utilities and tools disk.

disk.name: MSX ROMs 1
disk.description: MSX ROM images collection - volume 1.

disk.name: MSX ROMs 2
disk.description: MSX ROM images collection - volume 2.
